issue.title: [Plasma] add constructor/destructor to make sure dlfree is called automatically
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2540](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2540). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add constructor & destructor to ObjectTableEntry structure to make sure dlfree() is called for the pointer field when the object gets destructed.

comments.body:
